English: lit. food and medicine come from the same source (idiom)

d.f: `一~`種~`養生~`方法~。`為~`中國~`人~`獨有~`的~`特殊~`觀念~。`即~`利用~`各種~`食物~`來~`調養~`生理~`機能~，`使氣~`血~`順暢~，`疾病~`不~`生~。`如~`夏季~`的~`涼~`補~，`冬季~`的~`溫~`補~。

English: lit. food and medicine come from the same source (idiom)
fig. there is no clear-cut distinction between food and medicine
